metadata.title: CVE-2022-45142 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The fix for CVE-2022-3437 included changing memcmp to be constant time anda workaround for a compiler bug by adding "!= 0" comparisons to the resultof memcmp. When these patches were backported to the heimdal-7.7.1 andheimdal-7.8.0 branches (and possibly other branches) a logic inversionsneaked in causing the validation of message integrity codes ingssapi/arcfour to be inverted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45142` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
heimdal-kcm - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
heimdal-kdc - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
heimdal-multidev - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
heimdal-servers - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libasn1-8-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libgssapi3-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libhcrypto4-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libhdb9-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libheimbase1-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libheimntlm0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libhx509-5-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libkadm5clnt7-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libkadm5srv8-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libkafs0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libkdc2-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libkrb5-26-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libotp0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libroken18-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libsl0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libwind0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: heimdal package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4').
